thread.section_title: American RV Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American RV Company | www.americanrvcompany.com
thread.title: Kevin Browning
thread.title_full: American RV Company reviewed by Kevin Browning

author: Kevin Browning
title: Kevin Browning
text: I needed a new motherboard for my rv furnace. I had already had the problem diagnosed by a professional business, but they wanted to charge me $164.00 for the part and $62 for the labor. I told them I did not have money for the part and they showed me how to replace it when I did get the money. I called American RV and the part was $110, so I ordered it and I saved myself a bunch of money on the part and the labor. I will definitely be doing business with them in the future.
